employers.projectBrief: We're a regional nonprofit that has seen donor retention decline over the past two years. We have three years of donor data but lack the capacity to analyze it. We need someone to help us understand donor patterns, identify at-risk segments, and develop recommendations for improving engagement. This project will directly inform our fundraising strategy for the coming year.
successCriteria: Clear analysis of donor retention patterns with supporting data
Evidence-based recommendations our development team can implement
A presentation our board can understand and act on
deliverables: Final analysis with recommendations (near end of term)

employers.projectBrief: Our client onboarding process has grown organically over five years and is now inconsistent across teams. We need someone to document our current process, interview stakeholders to identify pain points, research best practices, and propose improvements. The goal is a streamlined process that improves client satisfaction and reduces staff time spent on administrative tasks.
successCriteria: Comprehensive documentation of current onboarding process
Stakeholder feedback synthesized into key themes
Implementation roadmap with prioritized action items
